entities.name: quirrell
entities.description: Quirrell is a wizard who has served Lord Voldemort faithfully. He is described as being weak and having been punished by Voldemort for his mistakes.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who is gasping in shock at Quirrell's revelation about serving Voldemort.

entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: Lord Voldemort is a powerful wizard who has been served by Quirrell. He is described as being unforgiving and having punished Quirrell for his mistakes.

entities.name: gringotts
entities.description: Gringotts is a location where the Stone was kept and where Quirrell failed to steal it.

entities.name: diagon alley
entities.description: Diagon Alley is a location where Harry met Quirrell and shook hands with him.

entities.name: the stone
entities.description: The Stone is an object that was kept at Gringotts and was the target of Quirrell's failed attempt to steal it.

entities.name: the leaky cauldron
entities.description: The Leaky Cauldron is a location where Harry shook hands with Quirrell in Diagon Alley.

relationships.description: Quirrell serves Lord Voldemort faithfully, although he has let him down many times.
Quirrell failed to steal the Stone from Gringotts.
Harry met Quirrell in Diagon Alley and shook hands with him at The Leaky Cauldron.
